title: Mocha Sponge Cake
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) butter', '175g (6 oz) caster sugar', '150g (5 oz) flour', '25g (1 oz) cocoa powder', '1 tbsp water mixed with 1 tsp instant coffee granules (or coffee essence)', '3 small eggs', 'Filling', '50g (2 oz) butter', '1 tsp instant coffee granules in 1 tsp water', '1 tbsp cocoa OR 25g (1 oz) melted chocolate', '75g (3 oz) icing sugar, or as needed']
